/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The sky is a clear blue, dotted with fluffy white clouds. On either side of the street, lush green trees stand tall, their leaves rustling in the breeze. Parked cars line the street, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. Street lamps stand sentinel along the sidewalk, ready to bathe the street in a warm glow as dusk falls. Colorful flags flutter in the wind, adding a vibrant splash of color to the scene. The image is a beautiful representation of urban life in Beijing, capturing the harmony between nature and cityscape.
